title: Wild West Music Pack
description: 10 original music themes will take you to the Old Wild West
longDescription:
Introducing the Wild West Music Pack, a unique collection of grandiose and adventurous music that takes you to the Old Wild West, with the sound of a powerful orchestra and traditional instruments. 10 unique music themes with catchy melodies and variations, perfect for adventure games, simulation, RPGs and much more.


Demos of the main versions of all the tracks included in the pack are available below:


YOUTUBE PREVIEW


This exciting new music pack is designed for developers who want to create an unforgettable Wild West experience for their players. Featuring a dynamic and evocative soundtrack that blends Spaghetti Western cinematic music with Country and Bluegrass, the Wild West Music Pack will transport your players to a world of gunslingers and outlaws, desert trails, and mystic encounters with Native Americans: electric guitars, mouth whistles, ocarinas, trumpets and tubular bells. Whether you're developing a platformer, a survival game, or an action-packed adventure, the Wild West Music Pack will add a new level of excitement and immersion to your project.


You can also use this music to promote your video game on Youtube and all the other social platforms. Fill out our form to clear any Content ID claim on your promotional videos: https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/




INCLUDED WITH THIS PACK:


  • 10 unique music themes with elaborate full-length structure;
  • 41 WAV files, including full-length versions, loops and stingers (intros or outros);
  • 1h and 8 minutes of audio in 16 bit / 44.1 Khz format
technicalDetails:
Included tracks:


  1. Wild West Saga (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): epic Spaghetti Western music;
  2. Last Duel (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): Spaghetti Western music for an epic showdown;
  3. Train To The Wild West (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): adventure, epic mood with the idea of open spaces and cinematic scenarios;
  4. Cowboy Adventure (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): a Country Bluegrass adventure music;
  5. Smoke Signals (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): slow, atmospheric Native American music;
  6. Western Inspiration (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): warm and comforting Country music;
  7. Wild West Ride (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): galloping march with full orchestra;
  8. Wildlife Sceneries (1 main theme, 2 loops): majestic and dramatic Orchestral music score;
  9. Navajo Trails (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): atmospheric and Cinematic Native American traditional music;
  10. Rushing Pizzicato (1 main theme, 2 loops, 1 stinger): small orchestral music for a rodeo.


Number of Audio Wavs: 41

Number of Audio Cues: 41

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 01:07:59

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: www.francescobiondimusic.com

Important/Additional Notes: if you want to clear a claim on your Youtube promotional video, please fill this form : https://www.pinegroove.net/content_id_release_form/
